title: Runic VelKoz with beard and mustache!
body:
Since I play Vel Koz and he does not have a lot of skin, I though of creating one.

Here's the concept

VelKoz is a floating cyclop head with a crown, his beard is his primary tentacle, and his mustache are his secondary tentacles.
It could easily become a chroma skin changing only the color of the hair, beard and mustache.
https://i.imgur.com/baPj2KQ.jpg

All his abilities would become related to runic (viking)
https://i.imgur.com/BvaKwYA.jpg
(something like that...)

this could also fit in with a 
Thor Olaf {{champion:2}} 
Loki Shaco {{champion:35}} 
Runeguard Volibear {{champion:106}} (already done)
Valkyri Leona {{champion:89}} (already done)

and many others

replies.body: As a vel' Koz main, I would buy this skin a heartbeat.
By far the funniest velkoz skin idea I've ever seen! I love the Nordic theme too. Is velkoz supposed to be Odin in this skin line?
could be, make him a normal head with an eye patch :P
for a second I thought the thumbnail was a banana peel
